w

| 19 | 17, 18 | #P_syl | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ w e. Word ran ( pmTrsp ` N ) ) -> ( ( S ` Q ) = ( -u 1 ^ ( # ` w ) ) -> ( S ` Q ) e. { 1 , -u 1 } ) ) |

| 21 | 20 | #P_rexlimdva | |- ( N e. Fin -> ( E. w e. Word ran ( pmTrsp ` N ) ( Q = ( ( SymGrp ` N ) gsum w ) /\ ( S ` Q ) = ( -u 1 ^ ( # ` w ) ) ) -> ( S ` Q ) e. { 1 , -u 1 } ) ) |
